summary: The diff implements most of the ForeverRaw brand transformation with the Gargoyle Dragon theme and side menu navigation. Core requirements including dark mythical theming, side menu structure, scan screen updates, raw language, and branding changes are present. However, the main home/chat screen (SocialFeed.tsx) does not fully match REQ-3 specifications, and therapist/Pro mode (ConsultantScreen.tsx) lacks complete session management tools required by REQ-5.

missing_requirements.requirement: Input field at bottom shows 'Type your punchâ€¦' placeholder
missing_requirements.reason: SocialFeed.tsx shows the input field below the hero image, not clearly positioned at the bottom of the screen as a persistent element. The AC specifies 'bottom input field' suggesting it should be at the screen bottom, not just below the hero section.

missing_requirements.requirement: Scan counter displays '10/10' for free users and 'Unlimited' for Pro subscribers with real-time updates
missing_requirements.reason: SocialFeed.tsx does not display the scan counter on the home/chat screen. The scan counter only appears on the ScanScreen.tsx, not on the main chat interface as required.

missing_requirements.requirement: Session management tools help track and organize therapeutic sessions
missing_requirements.reason: ConsultantScreen.tsx shows cards mentioning session notes and resolution guidance but does not implement functional session management tools. The component only displays descriptive text without actual tracking or organizing functionality.

missing_requirements.requirement: Session notes feature allows creating and saving notes
missing_requirements.reason: ConsultantScreen.tsx mentions session notes in a card but does not implement the feature to actually create and save notes. No forms, inputs, or save mechanisms are present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Resolution guidance tools are accessible and functional
missing_requirements.reason: ConsultantScreen.tsx mentions resolution guidance but does not implement accessible or functional tools. Only descriptive text is present without actual guidance functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: Hot Right Now section displaying trending punches on the main feed
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not specify a 'Hot Right Now' or trending section on any screen. SocialFeed.tsx implements HotRightNow component and displays trending content not requested in requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Social punch feed with like/unlike functionality and punch cards
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not specify social feed functionality, punch creation, or like/unlike features. The entire social punch system (PunchCard, usePunches hooks, like/unlike mutations) was not requested.
